description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hone your controller dexterity with the first installment of Game Training series.  Play through 10 levels of excitement with custom music, fantastic backgrounds, and increasing difficulty.
